title: Where do farmers get their seeds?

tasks.task: Understand the process of hybrid seed production and its impact on farming.
subtasks: Learn about plant genetics and gene versions.
Recognize that inbreds are used to produce uniform crops.
Explain the purpose of using hybrid vigor in crops.
Identify the reasons farmers do not save seeds from hybrid crops.

tasks.task: Operate equipment for harvesting and processing hybrid crops.
subtasks: Operate a combine harvester during the hybrid corn harvest.
Sort harvested corn components into different piles.
Remove seeds from the harvested corn for processing.
Pack and transport the hybrid corn seeds to storage or market.
